title: Gamification-Based Strategies for Sustaining Adolescent Language Learning Engagement

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language proficiency and fundamental smartphone operation skills
context.additional_context: Intermediate language training program for professionals in medical/legal/technical fields. Operated in limited-technology environments with project-based assessments and smartphone-centric delivery

learning_goals: Learners can voluntarily access language learning platforms at least three times per week through game-based activities.
Learners achieve a task completion rate of over 80% over four weeks by utilizing gamification elements (experience points, leveling up, leaderboards).
Learners interact with peers at least twice weekly through collaborative missions to enhance language proficiency.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
